required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Telmisartan Between Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg (T80/A5/H12.5 mg) Fixed-dose Combination (FDC) Tablet and T80/H12.5 mg Tab and A5 mg (Encap A2.5 mg Tab x2) Concomitant Use
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence of Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet Compared to Concomitant Administration of Telmisartan 80 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet and Amlodipine 5 mg Capsule in Healthy Male Subjects (an Open-label, Randomised, Single-dose, Two-sequence, Four-period Replicated Crossover Study), With Influence of Food on the Bioavailability of Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

brief_summary.textblock: The study will be performed as an open-label, randomised, single-dose, two-sequence, four-period replicated crossover design for the assessment of bioequivalence. A total of 72 healthy male subjects will be randomised to 2 groups. The subjects are administrated either T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet once or T80/H12.5 mg FDC tablet and A5 mg capsule once in each period. In addition, the study will be assessed the effect of food on bioavailability and pharmacokinetics (PK) for T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet. The length of admission will be 7days in each period.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of the analyte in plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 144 hours from drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-tz) of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-infinity) of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to extrapolated infinity

arm_group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet
Telmisartan 80 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet and Amlodipine 5 mg capsule

intervention.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg FDC tablet

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy male subjects age >=20 and <=35 years; body weight: >=50 kg and <=80 kg; body mass index: >=18.0 and <=25.0 kg/m2
- Without any clinically significant findings and complications on the basis of a complete medical history, including the physical examination, vital signs (blood pressure (BP), pulse rate (PR), body temperature)
- Signed and dated written informed consent prior to admission to the trial in accordance with the Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and the local legislation
Exclusion criteria:
- Any finding of the medical examination (including BP, PR and ECGs) deviating from normal and of clinical relevance
